name: Zucchini Bread with Coconut and Chocolate Chips
author: ksparkleg1
summary: Chocolate chips and coconut make delightful additions to this loaf of zucchini bread.
ingredients: ½ cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat the eggs in a large bowl until frothy
Stir the vegetable oil, sugar, and zucchini into the eggs
Sift the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl; stir into the zucchini mixture until combined
Fold the coconut and chocolate chips into the resulting mixture; pour into the prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 45 to 50 minutes
Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
